post.description: Verify user’s login credentials (username and password), then generate a session and return the session token back to user

get.description: Verify the received token and perform session clean up.

post.description: Receive the sign up information, validate username (check if it exists), password (has to be lower than 71 byte for bcrypt hashing), and email (correct format). Then generate the session and return the token to the user (auto login)

get.description: Search dishes by name, course list, and ingredient count range. Results are paginated and include total match count.
get.summary: Search dishes with filters and pagination

get.description: Retrieve a single dish by its UUID. If the dish does not exist, an empty object is returned.
Retrieve the full list of ingredients from the database
Search ingredients by a query string
Retrieve a single ingredient by its ID
Retrieve a meal card and its dishes belonging to the authenticated user.

put.description: Update meal card information belonging to the authenticated user.

post.description: Create a new meal card for the authenticated user.

delete.description: Remove a meal card belonging to the authenticated user.

get.description: Retrieve all meal cards for a specific day belonging to the authenticated user.

post.description: Add a dish to a meal card belonging to the authenticated user.

parameters.description: Add dish to meal card payload
parameters.name: request

404.description: Meal card or dish not found

delete.description: Remove a dish from a meal card belonging to the authenticated user.

parameters.description: Remove dish from meal card payload
parameters.name: request

404.description: Meal card or dish not found

get.description: Retrieve all meal cards for the month of the given date belonging to the authenticated user. The day portion of the date is ignored.
Get the user id from the received session token, then query and return the list of user’s favorite dishes.

delete.description:
Extract the user session from the provided token, validate the dish ID (UUIDv4),
then remove the dish from the user’s favorites list.

patch.description:
Extract the user session from the provided token, validate the dish ID (UUIDv4),
then insert the dish into the user’s favorites list.

get.description: Get the user id from the received session token, then query and return with the corresponding user’s information (except password)

patch.description: Get the user id from the received session token, then query and return with the corresponding user’s information (except password)

Extracts the user session from the provided token, validates the request body,
then updates the user's password.

valid.description: Valid is true if String is not NULL
